      • addJob

        public static void addJob(java.lang.String parkName,
                          java.lang.String jobName)
                   throws ScheduleConflictException
        Throws:
        {@link - NullPointerException} if any of the passed arguments are null
        {@link - IllegalFormatException} if the Job's end date is before the start date
        {@link - ScheduleConflictException}
        ScheduleConflictException
        Business Rule:
        Not more than the maximum number of pending jobs (start or end date) at a time, default of 20 (system-wide)
        , A job cannot be longer than the maximum number of days, default of 3
        , There can be no more than the maximum number of jobs scheduled on any given day, default of 4
        , A job cannot be scheduled more than the maximum allowed date into the future, default of 75 days added to the current date

      • volunteerJob

        public static void volunteerJob(java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String parkName,
                                java.lang.String jobName)
                         throws ScheduleConflictException
        Throws:
        {@link - NullPointerException} if any of the passed arguments are null
        {@link - NoSuchUserException} if the specified user does not exist
        {@link - InvalidUserTypeException} if the user is not of type Volunteer
        {@link - ScheduleConflictException} if the maximum number of volunteers has been reached
        ScheduleConflictException
        Business Rule:
        A volunteer cannot sign up for more than one job on any given day.
        , A volunteer may sign up only if the job is at least a minimum number of calendar days from the current date, default of 2.
        , Not more than the maximum number of volunteers for any job, default of 10
